mapper.select: SELECT mrp.mrp_code, mrp.item_code, mrp.required_qty, mrp.available_stock, mrp.shortage_stock, itm.item_type, itm.item_name, itm.item_spec, itm.item_unit, itm.item_cost, itm.company_code, cmp.company_name FROM mrp_result_detail mrp JOIN items itm ON mrp.item_code = itm.item_code LEFT JOIN client_comp cmp ON itm.company_code = cmp.company_code WHERE mrp.mrp_code = #{mrp_code}
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase_req WHERE pch_code = #{pch_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_req ( pch_code, company_code, pch_status, due_date, pay_amount, pay_method, ecode, memo, request_date, modify_date ) VALUES ( #{pch_code}, #{company_code}, #{pch_status}, #{due_date}, #{pay_amount}, #{pay_method}, #{ecode}, #{memo}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM purchase_req pch LEFT JOIN client_comp cmp ON pch.company_code = cmp.company_code WHERE 1=1
AND (
cmp.company_name LIKE '%' || #{search_word} || '%' OR cmp.manager_name LIKE '%' || #{search_word} || '%' )
AND pch.pch_status IN
#{status}

SELECT prd.pidx, prd.pch_code, prd.item_code, itm.item_name, itm.item_spec, itm.item_unit, prd.item_qty, itm.item_cost, itm.item_class1, itm.item_class2, pch.due_date, pch.pch_status, pch.request_date, pch.pay_amount, pch.pay_method, pch.memo, cmp.company_name, cmp.biz_num, cmp.ceo_name, cmp.manager_name, cmp.mng_phone, cmp.com_addr1, cmp.com_addr2, emp.ename FROM purchase_req_detail prd JOIN purchase_req pch ON prd.pch_code = pch.pch_code JOIN items itm ON prd.item_code = itm.item_code LEFT JOIN client_comp cmp ON itm.company_code = cmp.company_code LEFT JOIN employee emp ON pch.ecode = emp.ecode WHERE prd.pch_code = #{pch_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_req SET due_date = #{due_date}, pay_method = #{pay_method}, ecode = #{ecode}, memo = #{memo}, modify_date = SYSDATE WHERE pch_code = #{pch_code}
